name: Arts & Photography Books
description: In recent years, the Art world has embraced photography as a medium that people can use to create works of art. Yet, not all photographs are considered art.

name: Children & Holly Books
description: Genres in children's literature, Fantasy fiction, Historical fiction, Realistic fiction, Biography etc are available there.

name: Biographies books
description: Four basic types of biographies: historical fiction, academic, fictional academic, and the prophetic biography etc are available there.

name: Magazine & Comics
description: Different Types of Comic Books & Magazines are available there -Superhero, Slice-of-Life, Humor, Non-fiction, Science-Fiction/Fantasy, Horror etc.

name: Travel Books
description: Travel Books to Spark Your Wanderlust essential travel books are available there

name: Text Books
description: Book containing a comprehensive compilation of content in a branch of study with the intention of explaining it.Textbooks are produced to meet the needs of educators, usually at educational institutions.
